properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 9:23PM EST until January 6 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to
Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
